 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְצַף‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==wrath== (of God) (only Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sadness, anxiety***, in Lexicons); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ק‎</span> [[Ezra.7.23|Ezra 7:23]]. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְצָת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קצא‎</span>. above
